edge: Cooper was a former NASA test pilot
global blight causes extinction for humanity
Cooper joins the Endurance team to search for habitable planets

node_2: scientists romilly, doyle, amelia brand, and robots tars and case
edge: Endurance team consists of scientists Romilly, Doyle, Amelia Brand, and robots TARS and CASE
Endurance team arrives at a planetary system
planetary system consists of a supermassive black hole named Gargantua
Endurance team descends into the gravity well to survey an inhospitable ocean world
A colossal wave sweeps away Doyle during the Endurance team's survey of the first candidate planet
Endurance team loses 23 Earth-years due to severe time dilation caused by escaping the gravity well
Romilly remains aboard the Endurance while others descend into the black hole's gravity well to survey the first candidate planet
Amelia Brand's father is Professor Brand
Brand's father helps with a gravity equation
Brand's father works with Murph
Murph visits her childhood home
Cooper, the commander of the Endurance spaceship, leads the mission to search for a new home for humanity.
Mann is a NASA explorer who landed on the first candidate planet decades ago and fell into a coma. The Endurance crew revives him.
Cooper's daughter, Murph, wonders if Cooper knowingly abandoned her, but later helps complete Brand's equation.
Brand is a scientist who works on an equation to find a new home for humanity. Cooper continues his work.
In the year 2156, TARS is rescued by an O'Neill cylinder colony.
In the context, Cooper reunites with Murph on her deathbed.
On the final candidate planet, Amelia removes her helmet and breathes in the air of the new habitable world.
In the context, Cooper reunites with Murph.

On the final candidate planet, Amelia discovers a new habitable world.
